actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 to modify the threshold rates of unemployment that must be met by a State in order to establish eligibility for fourth-tier emergency unemployment compensation with respect to such State.

summary.text: Fairness in Unemployment Act - Amends the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 to revise the formula for determining if a state is in an extended benefit period. Modifies the threshold rates of unemployment that must be met by a state in order to establish eligibility for Tier-4 emergency unemployment compensation (EUC) for such state.

titles.title: To amend the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2008 to modify the threshold rates of unemployment that must be met by a State in order to establish eligibility for fourth-tier emergency unemployment compensation with respect to such State.
